giropay.value: I hereby agree that the service provider of lebara Ltd., Ayden GmbH, Hackescher Markt 4, 10178 Berlin, will debit any top up amounts I have requested from the account specified for my first payment by immediate transfer each time I reach my credit limit. I instruct my bank to honour the direct debits. The respective top up amount is for the telephone number I have specified.
giropay.fieldDescription: I hereby agree that the service provider of lebara Ltd., Ayden GmbH, Hackescher Markt 4, 10178 Berlin, will debit any top up amounts I have requested from the account specified for my first payment by immediate transfer each time I reach my credit limit. I instruct my bank to honour the direct debits. The respective top up amount is for the telephone number I have specified.
giropay.name: ./paymentMessages/giropay

sepadirectdebit.value: I authorize Lebara Limited (Creditor ID: NL42ZZZ342764500011) to collect payments from my account by direct debit. At the same time I instruct my bank to redeem the direct debits drawn from Lebara Limited on my account. Note: I can request reimbursement of the debited amount within eight weeks, starting with the debit date. All terms and conditions agreed upon with my bank still apply.

directDebitCheckboxText.fieldDescription: By clicking on "Pay" you accept the data protection guidelines, cancellation policy, service description for term tariffs and the terms and conditions for term contracts.

giroPayRedirectMessage.value: You will now be redirected to the giropay.com website. Please enter your bank details online for an immediate transfer. Use your online banking access to top up your credit or if you are a new customer add your required package. The credit/package will be available shortly after. Future top ups will then be charged from your account conveniently by direct debit.
giroPayRedirectMessage.fieldDescription: You will now be redirected to the giropay.com website. Please enter your bank details online for an immediate transfer. sofortRedirectMessage.value: You will now be redirected to the sofort.com website. Please enter your bank details online for an immediate transfer.
